ComicInfo.Summary: Sam and Twitch are trying to find the proof to nail Chief Banks, but he fires them before they can. Later Jason Wynn orders all support around Banks to be shut down, and Banks crumbles under the pressure and commits suicide.
ComicInfo.Title: Evil
